forum.name: bugs and glitches
forum.description: post bugs and glitches you find here
forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: rounded cube w/o hollow collision untouchable

comments.text: at [birbys lab] under boxes there are untouchable rounded cubes. we cant grab or contact laser them, help?
i have the same thing, one in my workshop and one in newcomers...
they are collidible if there is another part in the object
can you try me -> ... -> more -> disable thing merging, then see if you can context laser again? probably not, but worth a try
did we ever get a fix for this? i was editing a rounded cube and now its untouchable and uncontextlaserable in my home area. tried unmerging, no dice.
phil, here is a transporter to send you to the broken parts in birbys lab, hold and trigger it to go there. there are also broken parts in my home, crabby storks.
update  version 155.2 (you're on [version]):  this issue should now be fixed! Thx Zid, Blood & Bulb!
there are still broken shapes here, grab and trigger to go. the blueish green transparant ones.
we investigated but didn't yet find a fix for this latter variant of the issue, but can hopefully find a fix eventually!

thread.latestCommentText: we investigated but didn't yet find a fix for this, but can hopefully find a fix eventually!
